H0.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. English

H1.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. Welsh

H2.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. Scottish Gaelic

H3.text: what are the major languages spoken in the united kingdom. Irish

A4.text: English is the most widely spoken and de facto official language of the United Kingdom.

A5.text: Welsh is a de jure official language under the Welsh Language (Wales) Measure 2011 in Wales.

A6.text: Welsh is spoken natively in Wales by about 18% of the population.

A7.text: The Welsh Language (Wales) Measure 2011 gave the Welsh language official status in Wales.
